Description: Copper alloy cippus depicting Harpocrates with Bes head above, holding in both hands two serpents and a scorpion, as well as in his left hand a lion and in his right an ibex, standing on two crocodiles, with papyrus column on his right surmounted by Horus falcon wearing unidentified crown, and Nefertem emblem on his left; base reveals part of lead(?) core; smaller figures and texts in hieroglyphic discernible but not legible on both sides; cast from a stone original(?).
